TitleEnglish: Project SEKAI the Movie: Kowareta SEKAI to Utaenai MIKU
SummaryEnglish: Centers on Ichika Hoshino, a high school girl and street musician who encounters an unknown version of Hatsune Miku after hearing a Miku song that she'd never heard before in a CD store. Ichika learns that this version of Miku is having trouble reaching people with her songs, so together they team up to try to touch the hearts of their audience through music.
Aliases: Gekijōban Project Sekai: Kowareta Sekai to Utaenai Miku
Gekijouban Project Sekai: Kowareta Sekai to Utaenai Miku
Gekijōban Purojekuto Sekai Kowareta Sekai to Utaenai Miku
Gekijouban Purojekuto Sekai Kowareta Sekai to Utaenai Miku
Project Sekai the Movie: The Broken World and Miku Who Can't Sing
COLORFUL STAGE! The Movie: A Miku Who Can't Sing
